execution_plan.description: For every order, count how many order items (products) it contains and return the order id and order status. Include orders with zero items.
execution_plan.query: SELECT o.order_id, o.order_status_code, COUNT(oi.order_item_id) AS product_count FROM Orders o LEFT JOIN Order_Items oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id GROUP BY o.order_id, o.order_status_code;
